snippet: Leading academic institutions failed to inform parents of premature babies of the real risks involved in a medical study. How could this happen?
abstract: Editorial condemns medical research conducted by 23 leading academic institutions that failed to inform parents of premature babies of real risks involved in study; calls on Department of Health and Human Services to investigate how breakdown in ethics occurred.
lead_paragraph: Leading academic institutions failed to inform parents of premature babies of the real risks involved in a medical study. How could this happen?

headline.seo: An Ethical Breakdown in Medical Research
